column4: guys - trying to install ubuntu on my laptop, but it doens't work. It says that X couldn't be started, and at the end it doesn't even give me the command line. Can anyone help me ?
how ? it doesn't give me the command line
I just get a blinking cursor - I can't type
: put your logging  and password, then sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and answer the questions
it doen't has a login/password yet
and even thoug - it's not asking a login/pass .. it simply shows a blinking cursor
: try to install in text mode
the only key combination that works is ctrl+alt+del :(
It doesn't has any "text mode install" option
: you can download the alternate cd, then you have a text mode or press F1 for help and different boot options
